description: A comforting Vietnamese dish made with rice and chicken, perfect for cooler days.

instructions.text: Rinse the rice. Peel and finely slice the garlic and ginger. Slice the spring onion into thin rounds.
In a pot, saut√© the sliced garlic with a little oil until golden.
Set the garlic aside and add the rice to the pot with 1.2L of water. Bring to a boil.
Once boiling, add the stock cubes, sliced ginger, and the chicken breast.
Lower the heat (medium heat) and let simmer for 30 minutes, partially covered, skimming if necessary.
Remove the chicken and shred it. Season with nuoc mam, to taste.
Serve in a bowl with some rice and broth. Add shredded chicken, spring onion, coriander, fried garlic, and salt and pepper.

tips: Do not add coriander if you do not like it
You can use chicken thighs and grill the skin, then crumble it into the ch√°o for extra flavour
You can use any meat instead of chicken
For a vegetarian version, use vegetable stock and add mushrooms
